item.title: 南非经济以两年来最快速度增长
item.description: 受制造业和采矿业强劲反弹的提振，南非经济在第二季度以两年来最快的速度增长。【原文：South Africa’s economy expanded at the fastest pace in two years in the second quarter, lifted by a strong rebound in manufacturing and mining.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行称股市反弹面临 "买家疲劳 "风险
item.description: 随着投资者从强劲的看涨定位中撤退，美国股市最近创下的纪录似乎岌岌可危。【原文：The recent record run by the US stock market appears to be in jeopardy as investors retreat from their strong bullish positioning.】

item.title: 印尼新任财政部长誓言遵守 3% 赤字上限法
item.description: 印尼新任财政部长布尔巴亚-尤迪-萨德瓦（Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa）表示，他将把预算赤字控制在占国内生产总值 3% 的法定限额内，这一承诺有助于缓解投资者对印尼财政前景的担忧。【原文：Indonesia’s new finance minister Purbaya Yudhi Sadewa said he would keep the budget deficit within the legal limit of 3% of gross domestic product, a pledge that could help assuage investor concerns about the nation’s fiscal outlook.】

item.title: 甲骨文需要在2,000亿美元增长后保持销售额增长
item.description: 甲骨文公司（Oracle Corp. ）在今年股价大涨之后，面临着在人工智能支出推动下实现另一个季度收入加速增长的压力。【原文：The pressure is on for Oracle Corp. to deliver another quarter of accelerating revenue growth driven by spending on artificial intelligence after a run-up in its shares this year.】

item.title: 苹果公司 iPhone 17 和智能手表新品发布会：六大看点
item.description: 苹果公司将于周二举行本年度最盛大的产品发布会，届时该公司将在假日季节到来之前推出新款 iPhone 17 系列、智能手表和 AirPods。【原文：Apple Inc. will hold its biggest product launch event of the year Tuesday, when the company is set to unveil the new iPhone 17 lineup, smartwatches and AirPods ahead of the holiday season.】

item.title: 中国因迪奥上海分公司侵犯数据隐私被处罚
item.description: 中国对路威酩轩集团（LVMH）旗下位于上海的迪奥（Dior）品牌作出行政处罚，原因是其违反了数据隐私保护规定。【原文：China has imposed administrative penalties on LVMH’s Dior brand in Shanghai for violation of data privacy rules.】

item.title: 欧洲央行与美联储分歧成为焦点，欧元交易员重拾 1.20 美元押注
item.description: 欧元正在向 1.20 美元回升，因为投资者押注，随着美联储和欧洲央行将利率设定在越来越不同的道路上，共同货币将从中受益。【原文：The euro is climbing back toward $1.20 as investors bet the common currency will benefit as the Federal Reserve and European Central Bank set interest rates on increasingly divergent paths.】

item.title: 尽管担心关税问题，台湾出口仍创下月度纪录
item.description: 8 月份，台湾出口增长超过预期，创下 585 亿美元的单月最高纪录，凸显出尽管美国征收新关税，但对台湾科技产品的需求。【原文：Taiwan’s exports grew more than expected and reached a monthly record of $58.5 billion in August, underscoring demand for the archipelago’s tech goods despite new US tariffs.】

item.title: 据说日本央行今年有可能加息，尽管存在政治因素
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，日本央行官员认为，无论国内政局是否不稳定，今年都有可能再次上调基准利率，因为经济形势的发展符合预期。【原文：Bank of Japan officials are of the view that it may be possible to raise the benchmark interest rate again this year regardless of domestic political instability, as economic conditions have developed in line with expectations, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 马来西亚国家石油公司液化天然气工厂遭威胁后加强安保
item.description: 马来西亚能源巨头马来西亚国家石油公司（Petroliam Nasional Bhd.）表示，在政府加强位于沙捞越州的世界最大液化天然气设施之一的安全措施后，该公司正与当局密切合作。【原文：Malaysian energy giant Petroliam Nasional Bhd. said it was working closely with authorities after the government tightened security at one of the world’s largest liquefied natural gas facilities in Sarawak state.】

item.title: 市场历史性转变：法国借贷成本居意大利之首
item.description: 一项衡量法国借贷成本的指标在欧元区历史上首次超过了意大利，这表明投资者对财政政策的担忧正在重新影响该地区的债券市场。【原文：A measure of France’s borrowing costs exceeded Italy’s for the first time in the euro zone’s history, demonstrating how investor concerns over fiscal policy are redrawing the region’s bond markets.】

item.title: 获得中央银行批准后，Revolut 计划在阿联酋首次亮相
item.description: 在金融科技巨头 Revolut Ltd. 获得阿联酋中央银行的初步许可后，该公司正计划在阿联酋推出服务。【原文：Revolut Ltd. is planning to launch its services in the United Arab Emirates after the fintech behemoth secured initial approval for licenses from the country’s central bank.】

item.title: 加拿大皇家银行澳大利亚首席经济学家王素琳将于一月退休
item.description: 加拿大皇家银行资本市场（RBC Capital Markets）澳大利亚首席经济学家王素琳（Su-Lin Ong）在该银行工作了近三十年后，将于 1 月底退休。【原文：Su-Lin Ong, chief economist for Australia at RBC Capital Markets, will retire at the end of January after nearly three decades at the bank.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡将获得相当于 5 亿美元的人民币贷款
item.description: 斯里兰卡总统高级经济顾问表示，斯里兰卡将获得一笔相当于 5 亿美元的人民币贷款，以恢复一个停滞不前的高速公路项目。【原文：Sri Lanka is to take out a yuan-denominated loan equivalent to $500 million to resume a stalled highway project, according to the president’s senior economic adviser.】

item.title: 英国水务监管机构对两家运营商处以 8700 万英镑罚款
item.description: 英国监管机构 Ofwat 在对废水泄漏和寄生虫疫情进行调查后，对 Anglian Water 和 South West Water 处以 8680 万英镑（1.18 亿美元）的罚款。【原文：UK regulator Ofwat imposed £86.8 million ($118 million) of fines on Anglian Water and South West Water after investigating wastewater spills and parasite outbreaks.】

item.title: 联合国核负责人与伊朗外长将在开罗会晤
item.description: 联合国核监察机构负责人将于周二在埃及会见伊朗最高外交官，这是自以色列和美国今年 6 月轰炸伊斯兰共和国重要原子弹发射场以来他们的首次会面。【原文：The head of the United Nations nuclear watchdog will meet Iran’s top diplomat in Egypt on Tuesday, their first encounter since Israel and the US bombed the Islamic Republic’s key atomic sites in June.】

item.title: 美国和韩国在 3500 亿美元投资基金问题上陷入僵局
item.description: 美国和韩国在两国同意作为更广泛贸易协定一部分的 3,500 亿美元投资基金的细节问题上陷入僵局，首尔一位高级官员警告说，如果两国不能缩小分歧，甚至造船伙伴关系也会面临风险。【原文：The US and South Korea are in a deadlock over details of a $350 billion investment fund the two countries agreed to as part of a broader trade deal, with a top Seoul official warning that even the shipbuilding partnership is at risk if they fail to narrow the differences.】

item.title: 法国第三季度工业产值下降再添污点
item.description: 本周，随着弗朗索瓦-贝鲁（Francois Bayrou）政府的倒台，法国政府陷入混乱，本季度开局不利，7 月份法国工业生产出现下滑。【原文：French industrial production declined in July in a poor start to the quarter that descended into government chaos this week with the fall of Francois Bayrou’s government.】

item.title: 法国 10 年期基准债券滚动收益率超过意大利
item.description: 法国债券周二开盘变化不大，2035 年 11 月债券收益率为 3.48%。【原文：French bonds opened little changed on Tuesday, with the yield on the November 2035 bond at 3.48%.】

item.title: 豪华糖果商 Bateel 据称将探索在沙特阿拉伯进行首次公开募股
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，沙特阿拉伯的美食生产商和连锁餐厅 Bateel International LLC 正在探索首次公开募股，这项交易将为沙特阿拉伯王国的股票销售浪潮再添一把火。【原文：Saudi Arabia’s gourmet food producer and restaurant chain Bateel International LLC is exploring an initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter, in a deal that would add to the wave of share sales in the kingdom.】

item.title: 腾讯考虑自 2021 年以来首次出售债券，加入点心热潮
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，腾讯控股有限公司正考虑最早于本月出售离岸人民币债券，这是该公司四年来首次公开发债。【原文：Tencent Holdings Ltd. is considering its first public debt offering in four years with a sale of offshore yuan bonds as early as this month, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非斯帕尔出售瑞士业务，专注于本土市场
item.description: Spar Group Ltd. 同意以 5900 万美元的价格出售其在瑞士的业务，作为南非收入第二大的零售商，该公司将重点放在国内。【原文：Spar Group Ltd. agreed to sell its Swiss unit for $59 million as South Africa’s second-largest retailer by revenue hones its focus at home.】

item.title: 英美资源集团与泰克达成无溢价合并协议
item.description: 英美资源集团（Anglo American Plc）已同意与加拿大泰克资源有限公司（Teck Resources Ltd. ）进行零溢价合并，这是十多年来最大的矿业交易之一。【原文：Anglo American Plc has agreed to merge with Canada’s Teck Resources Ltd. in a zero premium deal, marking one of the biggest mining transactions in more than a decade.】

item.title: 荷兰政府计划将荷兰银行股份削减至约 20
item.description: 荷兰政府的投资机构荷兰国际金融公司（NLFI）周二在一份声明中表示，荷兰政府计划将其在荷兰银行（ABN Amro Bank NV）的持股比例降至约 20%，并将逐步减少在该银行的持股。【原文：The Dutch government plans to lower its stake in ABN Amro Bank NV to about 20% as it gradually pares its holdings in the lender, its investment vehicle NLFI said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际金融公司寻求 3 亿美元资助非洲小型电网建设
item.description: 国际金融公司（International Finance Corp. ）正在建立一个旨在降低非洲小型电网成本的实体，以加快实现到 2030 年让 3 亿非洲人用上电的计划。【原文：The International Finance Corp. is setting up an entity aimed at lowering the cost of mini grids in Africa, to accelerate plans to connect 300 million Africans to electricity by 2030.】

item.title: 蒙特帕斯基接管 Mediobanca，重塑意大利银行业
item.description: Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA 已获得 Mediobanca SpA 的多数股权，巩固了这一一度难以想象的 160 亿欧元收购案，这将重塑意大利金融业。【原文：Banca Monte dei Paschi di Siena SpA has secured a majority stake in Mediobanca SpA, cementing a once-unthinkable €16 billion takeover that’s set to reshape Italian finance.】

item.title: 高盛从壳牌获得 400 亿美元养老金资产委托
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. won a $40 billion mandate from Shell Plc to oversee pension assets for the energy company, in one of the biggest outsourced deals of its kind.】

item.title: 前谷歌地图和 Siri 高管支持 5900 万美元的欧洲特定行业人工智能基金
item.description: 一家由前硅谷高管支持的新风险投资公司正在寻求筹集高达 5000 万欧元（5870 万美元）的资金，用于投资北欧的初创企业，为企业开发人工智能应用。【原文：A new venture capital company backed by former Silicon Valley executives is seeking to raise as much as €50 million ($58.7 million) to invest in northern European startups building artificial intelligence applications for business.】

item.title: 墨西哥目标 2026 年缩小预算赤字，但增长放缓
item.description: 根据官方支出蓝图，墨西哥政府希望明年的预算赤字与今年的支出相比有所减少。【原文：The Mexican government is looking to trim its budget deficit next year compared to this year’s spending, according to its official spending blueprint.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将下挫，英镑逼近 1.36 美元
